article_title: Inmates lend a hand battling blazes in state
article_text:

og.description: During each wildfire season, a wild land firefighter crew made up of inmates from Arizona State Prison Complex (ASPC) - Yuma can be called upon to travel throughout Arizona to help battle any blaze which ignites in the wilderness.
